project.name: Skrill
project.description: Skrill has been moving money digitally since 2001. It offers online payment solutions for business and consumers, allowing them to pay and get paid globally.
project.what_we_did: Railslove has been developing several web applications based on Skrill's internal APIs and web services. Together with our friends from Netguru we launched Skrill's new e-wallet frontend My Account.
